message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offer and your counteroffer. I can sell it to you for $132.50.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Can you meet me at that price?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a bit more than $115 to make it worth my while. I can sell it to you for $122.50.
I'm getting close to walking away, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $118. Can you meet me at that price?
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at your last offer, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I can sell it to you for $120, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept.
